## What does a Business analytics professional do?

\begin{itemize}
\item  Using statistical and computational skills to answer business questions
\item  Visualizing data 
\item  Quantiative odelling (for big and small data \& for simple and complex data) 
\item  Being able to comunicate findings to experts and broad audiences 
\end{itemize}



```{r}

set.seed(43)
data = data.frame(word = c("Data", "Statistics", "Decision making",
                           "R", "Computational statistics", "Modelling",
                           "Visualization", "Comunicating with data", "Business analytics"),
                  weight = c(runif(8, min = 100, max = 800), 900),
                  col = seq(1:9))

set.seed(42)
ggplot(data, aes(label = word, size = weight, color = col)) +
  geom_text_wordcloud_area() +
  scale_size_area(max_size = 24) +
  theme_minimal()

ggsave("figs/word.pdf")
```
